home.h2: Mobile application based on BFBAN open source community to optimize local interaction of mobile devices on BFBAN.com.
home.hint: The app is supported by the BFBAN community and does not manage any accounts

1.q: Q: Login account using BFBAN APP Why Web version account dropped?
1.a:
bfban does not support multi-platform login, logging in to an account using the app will reset credentials, resulting in invalidation of other platforms

(Important) As of August 20, BFBAN has supported multiple terminals, and the application has also been adapted after 0.2.6

2.q: Q: Will BFBAN Assistant steal my information or reveal my privacy?
2.a:
No, BFBAN Assistant does not have any servers of its own and does not hijack any data, bfban accounts are handled internally by bfban.com itself.
BFBAN Assistant only locally processes the data submitted to the bfban service, but BFBAN Assistant collects individual characteristics, which are used for application analysis, and you can view the privacy agreement disclosed by the service

3.q: Q: Will uninstalling the APP cause the media library files to be deleted

4.q: Q: What is the relationship between BFBAN Assistant and BFBAN?
4.a: Developed by members of the BFBAN Open Source organization, the release version currently belongs to individuals, but its code is open source and anyone can participate or clone it

5.q: Q: The data list is not seen and the interface does not display the language
